name: naming convention v0.2
description: groups allowing hyphens must now begin a letter
content:
2011.02.30_michealine.f__w
2008.12.30_dona-may.anne.p_salem-winchester.hills.heights.district_w
2008.05.16_dan.e_anaheim.hills_w
2008_dan.e_anaheim.hills_m
2008.05_dan_anaheim_m
2008_dan__m
2008_d__m


*naming convention is:
yyyy[.mm{[.dd]]_firstname{24}[.middlename{16}[.lastinitial{1}]]_[city[.name[.upto[.4words]]]]_gendermw{1}

*years 2000-2099 are valid (don't care about earlier or later)
*firstname can be hyphenated (e.g. mary-louise)
*city is completely optional
*first word of city can be hyphenated (e.g. winston-salem)
*no apostrophes (e.g. no coeur.d'alene)
*gender is required( m [man] or w [woman] )
author: Darren Cassidy
